law.catch_line: Team Metro: Delegation of enforcement power and duties.

text.section:
Sec. 15-32.1. Team Metro: Delegation of enforcement power and duties.
Unless otherwise provided by ordinance, the Director of Solid Waste Management Department shall delegate his enforcement powers and duties to the Director of Team Metro for the expressed purpose of enforcing the regulations of this chapter as specified in or in an administrative order of the County Manager.
